com.mobius.vdrapi
Class OutputFormatDecisionTable

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.OutputFormatDecisionTable
public class OutputFormatDecisionTable
extends Object

The OutputFormatDecisionTable class contains key-value pair conversion rules which are used to override the default conversion settings. The key is a PageLanguageType value which indicates the data type of the page to be converted. The value is a RenderFormatType value which indicates the format for the conversion. This table is an optional input parameter to the CreatePageGroupCommand command. When present the command object uses the table during translation of the page data, based on the page language type. If a rule for that PageLanguageType exists in the table it will be respected and the page data shall be translated into the RenderFormatType specified. If no rule exists for that PageLanguageType then translation occurs based on the RenderFormatType specified in the OutputFormat parameter of the CreatePageGroupCommand command.

See Also:
CreatePageGroupCommand, PageLanguageType, RenderFormatType

isEmpty

Returns true if the decision table is empty. Otherwise it returns false

put

public void put(PageLanguageType pageLanguageType,
                RenderFormatType outputFormat)
Adds a key-value pair entry to the decision table. The key is a PageLanguageType value that represents the page data type. The value is a RenderFormatType that represents the conversion type for the page.
